attributes.action: abolish prescription charges for people on incapacity benefit
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I am currently unfit for work and at the moment I receive income support which allows me free presciptions which I need every 4 weeks.
In January, I will qualify for incapacity benefit, which currently is £2.00 per week more than income support, but I will have to pay for my prescriptions, which at the moment would cost me over £30 each month, so how would I and People like me be better on incapacity benefit.
